name: Stickman Killing Zombie
description:
The world of stickmen has a zombie epidemic - you must kill all the stickmen zombies become the new stickman hero ( the last stickman hero saved the stick world from zombies 20 years ago - you see, this is pretty common in the stickman world).

- Simple controls for running and killing: Supports gamepad as well as keyboard
- 3D world with zombies
- Ragdoll zombie deaths
- Steam Achievements
- Gameplay designed to get you "in the flow." You can listen to audiobooks n stuff as you play.


You never assumed your life as a stickman would get this violent.. but the world had other plans. You woke up and what you once loved became an infected cesspit. The city you once loved.. demeaned to this? You sigh as you get out your sword: this will be a long and bloody day.

Now, good sir, no more time to speak! quick! Dash through the infected areas of Detroit and complete missions in the order you want.
